T, ma ọ bụ t, bụ mkpụrụedemede iri abụọ na mkpụrụedemede Bekee ọgbara ọhụrụ yana mkpụrụedemede Latịn nke ISO

Aha ya na bekee bụ tee (akpọ /ˈtiː/), ọtụtụ tees.  O sitere na Semitic Taw 𐤕 nke odide Phoenician na Paleo-Hibru (Aramaic na Hebrew Taw ת//￼, Syriac Taw ܬ, na Arabic ت Tāʼ) site na mkpụrụedemede Greek τ (tau)
N'asụsụ bekee, a na-ejikarị ya anọchi anya plosive alveolar na-enweghị olu, ụda ọ na-egosikwa na mkpụrụedemede ụda olu mba ụwa
Ọ bụ consonant a na-ejikarị na nke abụọ a na-ejikarị eme ihe na ederede Bekee.
